title: North Belfast: Police release name of man stabbed in January
article: A 47-year-old man who died after being stabbed in north Belfast in January has been named as Martin Gavin. Mr Gavin died in hospital on Sunday and a murder investigation was launched. The Police Service of Northern Ireland (PSNI) said they had made a number of arrests in connection with the incident at a house in Harcourt Drive on Friday 7 January. Police have appealed for anyone who was in the area at the time of the attack to contact them.
